summary: Provides a mock implementation of the AWS Elastic Load Balancing v2 API, handling requests to create, describe, modify, and delete load balancers, listeners, target groups, rules, tags and related settings, and returning the appropriate formatted responses.
business_intent: Enable developers to test and develop applications that interact with ELBv2 without contacting the real AWS service by simulating ELBv2 behavior within the Moto testing framework.
